thread.section_title: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group | printpps.com | 2 of 52
thread.title: Randy
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by Randy

author: Randy
title: Randy
text:
Website was easy to design what I wanted and needed from my order.
Order process was seemless.
Received my order very quickly.
There was an error with part of my order, however, customer service was very responsive to this matter, took care of the issue and gave a reprint very quickly. For these reasons, I give them 5 stars and would absolutely use them again.
